committed_financing.reason: The document explicitly mentions a commitment letter and debt commitment, indicating committed financing.
committed_financing.clause_text: Parent has delivered to the Company true and complete fully executed copies of (a) the commitment letter, dated as of the date hereof, among JH North America Holdings Inc., a Delaware corporation and a wholly owned indirect Subsidiary of Parent (the "Borrower"), and Bank of America, N.A. and Jeffries Finance LLC (together, the "Initial Lenders") and (b) the fee letters related thereto (as redacted to remove only the fee amounts, pricing caps and the rates and amounts included in the "market flex"), in each case, including all exhibits, term sheets, schedules, annexes and amendments to such letters in effect as of the date of this Agreement (collectively, the "Debt Letters"), pursuant to which and subject to the terms and conditions thereof each of the Initial Lenders party thereto have severally committed to lend the amounts set forth therein to the Borrower.
committed_financing.reference_section: ARTICLE Article IV REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES OF PARENT AND MERGER SUB > Section 4.25 Financing

committed_financing.answer: JH North America Holdings Inc., a wholly owned indirect Subsidiary of Parent, has secured committed financing through a commitment letter with Bank of America, N.A. and Jeffries Finance LLC as the Initial Lenders. The financing is in the form of debt, and the Initial Lenders have committed to lend the amounts set forth in the Debt Letters to the Borrower.
committed_financing.reason: The document specifies the parties involved in the committed financing and the nature of the financing as debt.
committed_financing.clause_text: Parent has delivered to the Company true and complete fully executed copies of (a) the commitment letter, dated as of the date hereof, among JH North America Holdings Inc., a Delaware corporation and a wholly owned indirect Subsidiary of Parent (the "Borrower"), and Bank of America, N.A. and Jeffries Finance LLC (together, the "Initial Lenders") ... pursuant to which and subject to the terms and conditions thereof each of the Initial Lenders party thereto have severally committed to lend the amounts set forth therein to the Borrower.
committed_financing.reference_section: ARTICLE Article IV REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES OF PARENT AND MERGER SUB > Section 4.25 Financing

cash_on_hand.reason: The agreement explicitly states that cash on hand will be used to consummate the Merger and other transactions.
cash_on_hand.clause_text: Parent shall, and shall cause its Subsidiaries (including the Borrower) to, use reasonable best efforts to take, or cause to be taken, all actions, and to do, or cause to be done, all things reasonably necessary to consummate the Financing in an amount sufficient, together with cash on hand and amounts available to be drawn on the Parent Credit Facilities, to consummate the Merger and the other transactions contemplated hereby no later than the Closing.
cash_on_hand.reference_section: ARTICLE V – Covenants and Agreements > Section 5.15 – Financing and Financing Cooperation > (a)

cash_on_hand.answer: Parent shall, and shall cause its Subsidiaries (including the Borrower) to, use reasonable best efforts to take, or cause to be taken, all actions, and to do, or cause to be done, all things reasonably necessary to consummate the Financing in an amount sufficient, together with cash on hand and amounts available to be drawn on the Parent Credit Facilities, to consummate the Merger and the other transactions contemplated hereby no later than the Closing...
cash_on_hand.reason: The clause specifies that cash on hand, along with other financing sources, will be used to consummate the merger.
cash_on_hand.clause_text: Parent shall, and shall cause its Subsidiaries (including the Borrower) to, use reasonable best efforts to take, or cause to be taken, all actions, and to do, or cause to be done, all things reasonably necessary to consummate the Financing in an amount sufficient, together with cash on hand and amounts available to be drawn on the Parent Credit Facilities, to consummate the Merger and the other transactions contemplated hereby no later than the Closing...
cash_on_hand.reference_section: ARTICLE V – Covenants and Agreements > Section 5.15 – Financing and Financing Cooperation > (a)

financing_efforts_summary.answer: Parent shall, and shall cause its Subsidiaries (including the Borrower) to, use reasonable best efforts to take, or cause to be taken, all actions, and to do, or cause to be done, all things reasonably necessary to consummate the Financing in an amount sufficient, together with cash on hand and amounts available to be drawn on the Parent Credit Facilities, to consummate the Merger and the other transactions contemplated hereby no later than the Closing.
financing_efforts_summary.reason: The clause specifies the acquirer's obligation to use 'reasonable best efforts' to secure financing, which implies a strong commitment to pursue the necessary funding.
financing_efforts_summary.clause_text: Parent shall, and shall cause its Subsidiaries (including the Borrower) to, use reasonable best efforts to take, or cause to be taken, all actions, and to do, or cause to be done, all things reasonably necessary to consummate the Financing in an amount sufficient, together with cash on hand and amounts available to be drawn on the Parent Credit Facilities, to consummate the Merger and the other transactions contemplated hereby no later than the Closing.
financing_efforts_summary.reference_section: ARTICLE V – Covenants and Agreements > Section 5.15 – Financing and Financing Cooperation > (a)

substitute_financing_notice_and_efforts.answer: The acquirer is required to notify the company if financing becomes unavailable and must use reasonable best efforts to obtain substitute financing.
substitute_financing_notice_and_efforts.reason: The clause specifies that if funds become unavailable, the Parent must notify the Company and use reasonable best efforts to obtain substitute financing.
substitute_financing_notice_and_efforts.clause_text: If funds in the amounts set forth in the Debt Letters, or any portion thereof, become unavailable, Parent shall, and shall cause its Subsidiaries to, as promptly as practicable following the occurrence of such event (x) notify the Company in writing thereof and (y) use reasonable best efforts to obtain substitute financing...
substitute_financing_notice_and_efforts.reference_section: ARTICLE V – Covenants and Agreements > Section 5.15 – Financing and Financing Cooperation > (b)
